page.title: 10KING JOHN'S JEWELS
page.content: There is a farmhouse which traditionally marks the place where King JJohn is supposed to have lost the crown jewels when trying to escape fromhis enemies across the estuary sands."The whole convoy,horses and wagons loaded with stores and equipment,with the king's treasure and wardrobe,with his chapel and relics,and with all the paraphernalia which accompanied a medievalking on his travels,either swept away by the incoming tide or swallowed up in the treacherous quicksands,was lost in its entirity.Not a man,it is said,survived to tell the tale."
